definition: the Great Hall of the People in Beijing
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

(main) hall/large room for a specific purpose/CL:間|间[jian1]/relationship between cousins etc on the paternal side of a family/of the same clan/classifier for classes, lectures etc/classifier for sets of furniture

sentences.english: Opening ceremony of the 2011 Summer Camp at the Guangxi - Great Hall of the People.
sentences.chinese: 在南寧市的廣西人民大會堂舉行開營儀式。

sentences.english: I think the splendid building on the west side must be the Great Hall of the People.
sentences.chinese: 我想西邊那座宏偉建築一定是人民大會堂了。

sentences.english: The banquet was held in the brightly-lit Great Hall of the People.
sentences.chinese: 宴會在燈火輝煌的人民大會堂舉行。

sentences.english: The Great Hall of the People is beflagged.
sentences.chinese: 人民大會堂上插滿旗子。

sentences.english: The Great Hall of the People was built in 1959.
sentences.chinese: 人民大會堂是在一九五九年修建的。

sentences.english: Tian An Men Square is flanked by the Great Hall of the People and the Museum of the Chinese Revolution.
sentences.chinese: 天安門廣場兩側是人民大會堂和中國革命博物館。

sentences.english: The guests gathered in the banquet hall, the Great Hall of the People, which was filled with warm and festive atmosphere. The national emblem was placed above the podium.
sentences.chinese: 人民大會堂宴會廳內賓朋濟濟一堂，氣氛喜慶熱烈。

definition: (Chinese) National People's Congress/abbr. to 人大[Ren2 da4]
pinyin: Quan2 guo2 Ren2 min2 Dai4 biao3 Da4 hui4

definition: to receive sb/to grant an interview
Premier Zhou Enlai 周恩來|周恩来 (1898-1976)

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Ren2 min2 Jie3 fang4 jun1

definition: abbr. for 全國人大會議|全国人大会议[Quan2 guo2 Ren2 Da4 hui4 yi4], National People's Congress (NPC)
CCTV New Year's Gala, Chinese New Year special/abbr. to 春晚[Chun1 Wan3]
pinyin: Chun1 jie2 Lian2 huan1 Wan3 hui4

definition: Deng Xiaoping (1904-1997), Chinese communist leader, de facto leader of PRC 1978-1990 and creator of "socialism with Chinese characteristics"
